GiftCardToKnow_1: The gift voucher purchased is digital only and will be will be emailed to you or any designated recipient upon successful purchase.
GiftCardToKnow_2: The gift voucher is only available for one-time use, and are valid for 60 days from purchase date.
GiftCardToKnow_3: To utilize the gift voucher, please place your order at the partnerâ€™s beepit.com online store.
GiftCardToKnow_4: Apply the gift voucher's code to your order upon check out and the gift voucher's value will be deducted automatically.
GiftCardToKnow_5: If the value of your order exceeds the value of the gift voucher, the outstanding balance will be charged to your chosen payment method.
GiftCardToKnow_6: The gift voucher value will be valid for 60 days from the date of purchase with no extension after expiry.
GiftCardToKnow_7: The gift voucher is non-cancellable / non-refundable / non-exchangeable for cash upon purchase.
